name: Tools4Boards Spin Bronze 115mm Roto Brush
description: Ideal for initial base brushing before applying wax, and as a first brush after waxing to open the base structure. Hook it up to a power drill for a consistent finish and save your arm strength for skiing.Brush is 11.5cm wide.8mm brass bristles are durable.Compatible with the Tools4Boards Spin Handle + Hex.
